comments.raw_text:
Wrong tab is displayed after closing "Firefox has been updated" tab.

STEPS TO REPRODUCE
1. select the "Open my tabs tabs from last time" preference
2. open more than 2 tabs
3. select the first (left-most) tab
4. make a software update happen
5. quit Firefox
6. start Firefox
Note: a new tab has been inserted at the end (right-most) showing
      http://www.mozilla.com/en-US/firefox/4.0/whatsnew/
7. close this tab

ACTUAL RESULTS
The tab immediately to the left of the closed tab is displayed.

EXPECTED RESULTS
The first (left-most) tab is displayed.
That is, I want the same behavior as when a new tab is opened with
CTRL+T and then closing the new tab -- it jumps back to whatever
tab was shown at the time the tab was opened.

PLATFORMS AND BUILDS TESTED
Bug occurred in Firefox 4 RC1 when it was updated to RC2, Linux x86-64.
